Aug. 9, 1947 D Bream Contest
Bream Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
bream-contest
None
Thanksgiving
Bream, Gloucestershire Only 3 bands entered so they played again for the Gloucester Association Section finishing 1st Pillowell, 2nd Drybrook, 3rd City of Gloucester. March contest 1st Drybrook and District. Prizes - 1st £15, 2nd £10, 3rd £5.
Feb. 8, 2013, 2:54 p.m. Feb. 15, 2019, 12:24 p.m.
1 A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Band Unknown
2 Pillowell Silver Band Unknown
3 City of Gloucester Band Unknown
